Html:
Hi there,

i am trying to install Adobe Flash Player 32-bit/64-bit ActiveX 23.0.0.207 with the wsus Server on our customers client. Ive imported the update with the catalogs which are coming with the installation. Ive got no error in the import of the update. But when i try to install them on the client i get a 80070667 error.

Here are some stuff from the windowsupdate Log (i cant see the reason for the problem there):

(If you need the full updatelog pls let me know.)

Regards...

Hello,

i took now the other FlashPlayer Catalog and imported the Updates over them. Now the updates get installed without any problems. Maybe a problem with the other catalog?

Regards...
